quiz.question: What is the Fibonacci sequence?
options: Each number is the sum of the two preceding ones
Each number is the product of the two preceding ones
Each number is double the previous number
quiz.answer: Each number is the sum of the two preceding ones

quiz.question: Time complexity of naive recursive Fibonacci implementation is:
Time complexity of Fibonacci using dynamic programming is:
Which technique can compute Fibonacci in O(log n) time?

hackerrank_problems.title: Fibonacci Modified
hackerrank_problems.description: Compute a modified Fibonacci sequence for large numbers using DP or iteration.

hackerrank_problems.title: Recursive Digit Sum
hackerrank_problems.description: Use recursion and memoization techniques related to Fibonacci for efficient computation.

hackerrank_problems.title: Red John is Back
hackerrank_problems.description: Solve complex combinatorial counting using Fibonacci-like DP sequences.
